alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 10:14PM CDT until June 25 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Garland County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1014 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hot Springs National Park, or near Hot Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Mountain Pine... Lonsdale... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Lake Ouachita State Park... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Avant... Magnet Cove... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Mountain Valley... Lena Landing Rec Area... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Hamilton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
